summary: A man and his family travel 3200km (1984 miles) by bicycle, from the State of Paraíba to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, in search of a job.
cast: Cláudia Abreu|Wagner Moura|Ravi Ramos Lacerda|Manoel Sebastião Alves Filho|Felipe Newton Silva Rodrigues|Cícera Cristina Almino de Lima|Cícero Wesley A. Ferreira|Claudio Jaborandy|Sidney Magal|Franciolli Luciano|Carol Castro|Caco Monteiro|Laís Corrêa|Fábio Lago|Alexandre Zacchia|Augusto Madeira|Marcello Gonçalves|Lúcio Leonn|Giobanni Marsallis|Haroldo Serra|Angela Escudero|Ana Marlene|Hiramissa Serra|Hiroldo Serra|Ana Cristina Viana|Seraão Santos|Márcio Araújo|Lincoln Oliveira Magalhães|Johayne Ildefonso|Luca De Castro|Thierry Tremouroux|Carla Regina|Cesar Rodrigues
title: O Caminho das Nuvens
